channel.title: Lorenzo's Daily Deep Dive
channel.description: A daily analysis of all of the AI and global news of the day I find from subscribing to a bunch of interesting newsletters
channel.itunes:author: Lorenzo Thione
channel.itunes:summary: A daily analysis of all of the AI and global news of the day I find from subscribing to a bunch of interesting newsletters

item.title: Lorenzo's Daily Deep Dive - February 20, 2026
item.description: Today's AI and tech news roundup covering: eBay acquires Depop for $1.2B, Amazon's AI employee tracking via Clarity, AMD backstops $300M Crusoe AI chip loan, ZaiNar's $1B GPS alternative for physical AI, Hungryroot eyes 2026 IPO after 55% growth, Ford's $30K EV pickup bet, Zuckerberg testifies in social media trial, Perplexity drops ads, and more from The Information.
item.itunes:author: Lorenzo Thione
item.itunes:summary: Today's AI and tech news roundup covering: eBay acquires Depop for $1.2B, Amazon's AI employee tracking via Clarity, AMD backstops $300M Crusoe AI chip loan, ZaiNar's $1B GPS alternative for physical AI, Hungryroot eyes 2026 IPO after 55% growth, Ford's $30K EV pickup bet, Zuckerberg testifies in social media trial, Perplexity drops ads, and more from The Information.

item.title: Welcome to Lorenzo's Daily Deep Dive
item.description: Lorenzo's Daily Deep Dive is a daily AI-generated podcast covering the latest in AI, tech, and business news curated from top newsletters. New episodes every morning.
